hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"(The months in which) We fasted twenty-nine days at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), were more than (the months in which) we fasted thirty days

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الشَّهْرُ تِسْعٌ وَعِشْرُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning: “The month is twenty-nine (days)”
